movies.title: Poussières d'Amérique
movies.plot: A dream-like story of America put together out of silent-film material from the archives, interspersed with many different accounts to be read, some of them in verse.
movies.simplePlot: A dream-like story of America put together out of silent-film material from the archives, interspersed with many different accounts to be read, some of them in verse.

companyCreditsSimple.name: Le Fresnoy Studio National des Arts Contemporains
